attributes.action: Build public water fountains on main streets in cities
attributes.additional_details:
Lots of people especially the homeless could do with fresh water fountains so that they don't have to feel awkward filling up in a toilet bathroom or asking a shop clerk for water 

It could help people be healthier, by providing an alternative to buying bottles of high sugar juice and pop
attributes.background: Make fresh drinking water fountains available in the main Street(s) in cities and town so that everyone has access to clean water without having to pay for bottles

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about installing water fountains are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to provide funding for new water fountains, or requiring local authorities install water fountains in certain places.
